name: New/Updated MySQL Row (PAYMENT) - Perform Calculations for Payment
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: updated_row_v2
code.title: New/updated row in netsuite_1099_payment
code.description: New/updated row in netsuite_1099_payment table in MySQL

block.name: search_rows
block.title: Select rows in netsuite_1099_payment_bill
block.description: Select rows in netsuite_1099_payment_bill table in MySQL
block.comment: Get all the Payment-Bill records related to this Payment

block.name: accumulate_list_items
block.title: Accumulate items to tempExpenseAmounts list
block.comment: Sum the values of each box,  Store the amounts for each 1099 category across all bills and update the Payment record (end result - we now know the amount to apply to each box for this payment)    i.e (Store the values of each box in a dedicated list column)

block.name: update_rows
block.title: Update rows in netsuite_1099_payment
block.description: Update rows in netsuite_1099_payment table in MySQL
block.comment: Update the Payment record (end result - we now know the amount to apply to each box for this payment) and Update the state of the Payment to be "payment-calculated" (make sure to update last_modified to now(3) as well)

code.comment: New/Updated Row from Payment table where state = "bills-entered"
